name: .NPV4
summary: Learn about .NPV4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To open an NPV4 file with NapsternetV (Android, iOS):
Open the app and select the + button in the upper-right corner.
Navigate to and import your NPV4 file.
When importing an NPV4 file, you may be asked to enter a password associated with the file. After importing the file, tap it and press the app's Play button to use it.
